Translations.Text: Ih, Nweeea yak ed, akken Nweeea i Nue, akked lambiyya deffir es. Nweeea i Iboahim, Ismaail, Iseaq, Iaaqub, laaoac, Aisa, Yub, Yunes, Harun, Sliman. Nefka Ihellilen i Dawed
Akked lambiyya i$ef ik ed Neeka, uqbel; akked lambiyya, i$ef ur ak ed Neeki. S tidep, Immeslay Oebbi i Musa
Lambiyya ipbeccioen, inedoen, iwakken ur pnamaren medden $ef Oebbi, deffir imazanen. Oebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Maca, Icuhhed Oebbi $ef wayen ik ed Issers, s tmusni S. Ad cehhdent lmalayek. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Anagi
Ih, wid ijehlen, u iieooifen seg ubrid n Oebbi, ni$ nnetlafen ttelfan u$miq
Ih, wid ijehlen u densen, ur sen Ipsemmie Oebbi, ur ten Ippawi d ubrid
siwa abrid n Loahennama, degs ad wekkoen, i lebda. Ayagi, Izga d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
A yimdanen! Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan, s tidep, s$uo Mass nnwen. Amnet, ppif i kunwi. Ma tugim, ihi n Oebbi, i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Izga Ieoa, d Bab n uuwab

A yAt Tezmamt! Ur sfuhruyet ddin nnwen. Ur qqaret, $ef Oebbi, siwa tidep. Lmasie Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, d amazan kan n Oebbi; d awal iS i Irra ar Meryem, u d ooue s $uoeS. Ihi, amnet s Oebbi akked imazanen iS, ur qqaoet: "krav"! Eebset, ppif i kunwi. Oebbi d Yiwen kan n Oebbi. Gedha s yiS, ma ad Isau mmi S! IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Awkil
